column1: tenna is a Quenya word meaning "unto"
column3: pp. 35-36 or "to the object hence up to
column6: said to be a "preposition originally adverb".

column1: When followed by a word beginning in a similar vowel
column2: tenna takes an Wikipedia:Elision form (tenn’).Petri Tikka
